name: ASTONISH ANTIBACTERIAL SURFACE CLEANSER 750ML – POMEGRANATE & RASPBERRY
description:
Price including VAT
Our Special Aromatic Edition Antibacterial Surface Cleanser makes sure your surfaces are not just clean but hygienically clean. We’ve got it covered! Now with the sweet and fruity aroma of Pomegranate and Raspberry, you can leave your home feeling fruity and fresh!
Use all around the home and leave for 5 minutes for complete disinfection before wiping off.

For hygienically clean surfaces
Kills 99.9% of bacteria
With no bleach, no dye and pH neutral the product is suitable for use on food preparation areas
Fruity pomegranate and raspberry fragrance
Also ideal for use in fridges, on high chairs, bins and toilets
Leave for 5 minutes for complete disinfection before wiping clean

name: ASTONISH DAILY SHOWER SHINE 750ML – HIBISCUS BLOSSOM
description:
Price including VAT
We think our Special Aromatic Edition Daily Shower Shine is a sparkler.  A winner all round. With a fragrant blossom scent, our Daily Shower Shine with essential oil will leave your shower feeling as invigorated as you do. Spray over surfaces after use to prevent the build-up of watermarks and limescale, reducing the need for that deep clean.

Quick and easy daily cleaning solution, simply spray and leave, no scrubbing required
Works to dissolve soap scrum and water marks leaving a crystal clear shine
Regular use helps prevent limescale build-up
Use on plastic & glass screens, enamel trays, tiles and vinyl curtains
With an floral hibiscus blossom scent

name: ASTONISH KITCHEN CLEANER 750ML – RUBY GRAPEFRUIT
description:
Price including VAT
Our Special Aromatic Edition Kitchen Cleaner is that every day helping hand, the hero under the sink. Not only will our Ruby Grapefruit cleaner cut through grease and kitchen grime with ease, but it’s bursting with citrus fruits, natural orange and grapefruit oils, leaving your kitchen feeling subtropical and you uplifted.
Vegan

name: ASTONISH OXY ACTIVE PLUS FABRIC STAIN REMOVER 500G
description:
Price including VAT
Astonish Oxy Active Plus Fabric Stain Remover 500g 
 
‘One Scoop in Every Wash’
 
Astonish understand the real cleaning challenges you face everyday. They have spent over 40 years making sure their products help you to get the job done right..and they couldn’t have made it any easier than Astonish Oxy Active Plus!
 
Simply add 1 scoop to every wash to boost stain removal. For those tough stains or hard to launder items, you can also use to pre-treat or soak stained items.
 
In Wash: Add 1 scoop into washing machine drawer or drum. Use with normal laundry detergent at 40 degrees or above. This pack contains enough for 16 standard loads (2.5kg washed in medium water).
 
Soak: Add 1 scoop into 5 litres of water at 40 degrees Celcius. Soak colours for 1 hour maximum and whites for 8 hours maximum.
 
Pre-Treat: Mix 1/4 scoop with 3/4 scoop of water. mix and pour/rub onto the stained area. Leave for 5 minutes maximum and then wash as normal.
 
1 scoop – 25ml (5tsp) or 31g
*Caution*
Always follow garment instruction care. Keep out of reach of children.

name: GREEN SHIELD ANTI-BACTERIAL FOOD SURFACE WIPES 70PK
MINKY M CLOTH ANTI BACTERIAL CLEANING PAD
MINKY M CLOTH ANTI-BACTERIAL KITCHEN PAD
SCRUB DADDY GREEN
description:
Price including VAT

Scrub Daddy’s FlexTexture® changes texture based on your water temperature. Firm in cold water for tough scrubbing, soft in warm water for light cleaning.
He rinses free of debris, resists odours, and cleans well with water alone.
Scratch free on over a dozen surfaces from non-stick to stainless steel and even car exterior paint.
His eyes hold onto your fingers and mouth cleans both sides of utensils.

Soft in warm water & Firm in cool water

name: SCRUB MOMMY PINK
description:
Price including VAT
Dual-Sided Scrubber & Sponge
The Scrub Mommy dual-sided washing up sponge changes texture based on water temperature, staying firm in cold water for tough scrubbing and relaxing in warm water for light cleaning.
This clever scrubbing sponge is a useful tool for cleaning all kinds of kitchen utensils and household surfaces, and is scratch free on most surfaces too!

Features
Smile face ergonomics, the eyes hold onto your fingers and mouth cleans both sides of utensils.

name: TRUWASH PROFESSIONAL GLASS POLISHING CLOTH
description:
Price including VAT
TruWASH Professional Glass Polishing Cloth, For Window Cleaning, Easy Use – Blue
 

Meet our Professional Glass Polishing Cloth – used the world over by Professional Window Cleaners. This cloth is specially designed to deliver the best results with TruWASH Glass & Shiny Stuff Cleaner.
You won’t believe your eyes when you see how quickly and effortlessly you can clean glass, work tops, car windscreens, stainless steel, shower doors and more.
For best results, use TruWash sparingly – a little goes a long way, and fold the Polishing Cloth as you go in order to keep it as dry as possible.
IMPORTANT: Please refrain from using fabric softener when washing your TruWash Professional Glass Polishing Cloth as this will result in streaked surfaces and no-one wants that, right?

name: TRUWASH SURFACE MULTI SURFACE CLEANING SPRAY 750ML
description:
Price including VAT
TruWash SurFACE Multi-Surface Cleaning Spray, With Natural Orange Extract Scent

Finally it’s here, SurFACE our new multi surface cleaner. When we say MULTI we mean it. We have spent months developing this.
When I say we I mean Me, Little Miss Mops and Irish Cleaning Mammy (of Instagram) I knew those guys know a thing or two about cleaning AND would not hold back when it came to what they wanted from this product.
The idea was to come up with a product that not only smelled fantastic (natural orange extract) but also did as good a Job on all surfaces as QUICKSHINE does on Glass!
We wanted it to be not only STRONG but GENTLE hence there are NO TOXINS in it and also BIODEGRADABLE. The Orange scent not only smells delicious but helps with the cleaning too.
Again we went for a great quality spray nozzle to ensure a great spray pattern to cover more area so as its not just a small spray which encourages you to spray more product
We have discovered SurFACE is fantastic when used with a DRY CLOTH to leave a streak free shine when you just want to do a super quick clean. Just in case your Mother-in Law arrives unexpected Lol.
 

Can be used on:

WORKTOPS (Including Granite and Composite)
Extractor Hoods
Sanitary ware
Stainless Steel and Chrome
Tiles (with a dry flat mop for a super quick clean)
Wood
Leather (do a test first though)
Wall Marks
Plastic and PVC
Car Wheels

name: ZOFLORA FRESH HOME GREEN VALLEY FRAGRENCE
